<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3050</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Excerpts from diaries, memoirs, and letters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Excerpts von den Tagebüchern, von den 
Abhandlungen und von den Zeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Extraits des agendas, des mémoires, et des 
lettres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excerpts dos diários, dos memoirs, e das letras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Brani dai diari, dalle memorie e dalle lettere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποσπάσματα από τα ημερολόγια, τα απομνημονεύματα, και
τις επιστολές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extractos de los diarios, de las memorias, y de 
las cartas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">During the Holocaust, Jews documented their experiences in their own words and from their own perspective in letters and diaries.This reource contains the memoirs written by Holocaust survivors who witnessed the crime with their own eyes and experienced the horrors firsthand</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">World War II</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">archive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exhibition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paintings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">artists</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Während des Holocaust dokumentierten Juden ihre 
Erfahrungen in ihren eigenen Wörtern und von ihrer eigenen 
Perspektive in den Zeichen und in diaries.This enthält reource die 
Abhandlungen, die von den Holocaust Überlebenden geschrieben werden, 
die das Verbrechen mit ihren eigenen Augen zeugten und die 
Grausigkeiten aus erster Hand erfuhren</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendant Holocauste, les juifs ont documenté 
leurs expériences de leurs propres mots et de leur propre perspective
dans les lettres et le diaries.This le reource contient les mémoires 
écrits par Holocauste les survivants qui étaient témoin du crime 
avec leurs propres yeux et ont éprouvé les horreurs de première 
main</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Durante o Holocaust, os jews documentaram suas 
experiências em suas próprias palavras e de seu próprio perspective
nas letras e no diaries.This o reource contem os memoirs escritos 
pelos sobreviventes de Holocaust que testemunharam o crime com seus 
próprios olhos e experimentaram os horrors firsthand</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Durante il Holocaust, gli ebrei hanno documentato
le loro esperienze di loro proprie parole e dalla loro propria 
prospettiva nelle lettere ed in diaries.This il reource contiene le 
memorie scritte dai superstiti del Holocaust che hanno testimoniato il
crimine con i loro propri occhi ed hanno avvertito gli orrori 
firsthand</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατά τη διάρκεια του ολοκαυτώματος, οι Εβραίοι 
τεκμηρίωσαν την εμπειρία τους στις λέξεις τους και από την 
προοπτική τους στις επιστολές και τα ημερολόγια Αυτό το 
reource περιέχει τα απομνημονεύματα που γράφονται από τους 
επιζόντες ολοκαυτώματος που βεβαίωσαν το έγκλημα με τα μάτια τους
και δοκίμασαν τις φρίκες από πρώτο χέρι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Durante el Holocaust, los judíos documentaron 
sus experiencias en sus propias palabras y de su propia perspectiva en
cartas y diaries.This el reource contiene las memorias escritas por 
los sobrevivientes de Holocaust que atestiguaron el crimen con sus 
propios ojos y experimentaron los horrores de primera mano</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweiter Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Archiv</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künstler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Deuxième guerre mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">archives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exposition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">peintures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">artistes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
